PHRASE.LANG: Part of the elusive eternal skull collection, this Diamond skull is as luxurious as it is dreaded. [#Legal]
Ce crâne en diamants est aussi luxueux que redouté. Il fait partie de la collection insaisissable de crânes éternels. [#Legal]
Dieser Diamantschädel ist Teil der unfassbaren, ewigen Schädelkollektion. Er ist so luxuriös wie gefürchtet. [#Legal]
Parte della sfuggente collezione di teschi eterni, questo teschio di diamante è tanto lussuoso quanto temuto. [#Legal]
Esta calavera de diamante, tan lujosa como aterradora, forma parte de la ansiada colección Calavera eterna. [#Legal]
찾기 어려운 영원의 해골 콜렉션 중 일부로, 이 다이아몬드 해골은 사람들이 두려워하는 만큼 호화롭습니다. [#Legal]
Part of the elusive eternal skull collection, this Diamond skull is as luxurious as it is dreaded. [#Legal]
永恆骷髏頭系列之一。這個鑽石骷髏頭固然可怕，也同樣名貴。 [#Legal]
